[[Image:Saltshore Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Saltshore on the continent of Westeros.]]

'''Saltshore''', sometimes rendered as '''Salt Shore''', is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. The castle is located on the southern coast of Dorne, on the [[Summer Sea]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Salt Shore is the seat of House Gargalen.
sections.History:
===[[Season 1]]===
[[Joffrey Baratheon]] claims that lords will come from all of Westeros, from the [[Last Hearth]] in the north to the Salt Shore in the south, to his and [[Sansa Stark|Sansa]]'s wedding.<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
